tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE TrafficData (
  timestamp TIMESTAMP,
  vehicle_id INT,
  speed INT,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  traffic_volume INT
)

CREATE TABLE DeviceData (
    device_id UUID,
    sensor_type VARCHAR,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR,
    data JSONB,
    PRIMARY KEY (device_id, timestamp)
);

CREATE TABLE TrafficFlowData (
    flow_id UUID,
    road_name VARCHAR,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    vehicle_count INT,
    flow_direction VARCHAR,
    PRIMARY KEY (flow_id)
);

CREATE TABLE UrbanPlanningData (
    plan_id UUID,
    area_name VARCHAR,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    population INT,
    development_status VARCHAR,
    PRIMARY KEY (plan_id)
);

CREATE TABLE TrafficSensors (
  sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  sensor_type VARCHAR(50),
  installation_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE TrafficData (
  data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  traffic_flow INT,
  traffic_speed INT,
  timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE TrafficEvents (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  sensor_id INT,
  event_type VARCHAR(50),
  event_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE UrbanPlanning (
  area_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  area_name VARCHAR(255),
  population INT,
  avg_income DECIMAL(10,2)
)

CREATE TABLE IoT_devices (
    device_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    device_type VARCHAR(50),
    device_location GEOGRAPHY,
    last_communication TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Traffic_cameras (
    camera_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    camera_location GEOGRAPHY,
    camera_type VARCHAR(50),
    camera_status BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE Traffic_events (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    event_location GEOGRAPHY,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Urban_planning (
    plan_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    plan_name VARCHAR(50),
    plan_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Road_segments (
    segment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    segment_name VARCHAR(50),
    segment_length FLOAT,
    segment_status BOOLEAN
)
